pr_title: Issue #795 - Add built-in support for CARIN BB IG

timeline.message:
Issue #795 - Add built-in support for CARIN BB IG

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: maybe add a test to loop through all the resources and validate them?
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: spoke with john on this one and he said that, for some reason, the bluebutton IG doesn't include a package index.  so he had to manually generate it, and he performed this validation when he did that, so only valid resources are included in the index.
replies.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: Added validation to unit test in US Core but left it out of CARIN BB (the validation in IndexGenerator is sufficient per our conversation).
replies.author: JohnTimm

timeline.message:
